snippet: Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal have pulled out of the Rogers Cup, leaving the Toronto tournament without three of the world's top four men's tennis players....
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal have pulled out of the Rogers Cup, leaving the Toronto tournament without three of the world's top four men's tennis players.

headline.print_headline: Federer, Nadal Join Murray in Skipping Rogers Cup
headline.main: Federer, Nadal Join Murray in Skipping Rogers Cup
